Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.test

Element:  ChoiceElement
Value:    date or dateTime or DateTimeString

Entry:    ThingWithChoiceField
Property: ChoiceElement 1..1
          ChoiceElement only dateTime





Entry:   PrimitiveTypeConstraintOnField
Parent:  ThingWithChoiceField
         

Entry:   NonPrimitiveTypeConstraintOnField
Parent:  ThingWithChoiceField
         ChoiceOfDatishThings only DateTimeString

Element:  DateTimeString
Value:    string
